TEXT.English: %s1_CityName can't carry over [ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow any more. The lost %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] is converted into %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!
TEXT.French: %s1_CityName can't carry over [ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow any more. The lost %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] is converted into %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!
TEXT.German: %s1_CityName can't carry over [ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow any more. The lost %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] is converted into %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!
TEXT.Italian: %s1_CityName can't carry over [ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow any more. The lost %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] is converted into %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_CityName can't carry over [ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow any more. The lost %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] is converted into %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!

TEXT.English: When a city production is enough to finish more than one item, it can produce multiple items per turn.
TEXT.French: When a city production is enough to finish more than one item, it can produce multiple items per turn.
TEXT.German: When a city production is enough to finish more than one item, it can produce multiple items per turn.
TEXT.Italian: When a city production is enough to finish more than one item, it can produce multiple items per turn.
TEXT.Spanish: When a city production is enough to finish more than one item, it can produce multiple items per turn.
